cast.overview: The family-friendly movie explores the transformational role prayer plays in the lives of the Jordan family. Tony and Elizabeth Jordan, a middle-class couple who seemingly have it all – great jobs, a beautiful daughter, their dream home. But appearances can be deceiving. In reality, the Jordan’s marriage has become a war zone and their daughter is collateral damage. With the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman, Elizabeth discovers she can start fighting for her family instead of against them. Through a newly energized faith, Elizabeth and Tony’s real enemy doesn’t have a prayer.
cast.title: War Room

cast.overview: A heroic fire captain values dedication and service to others above all else, but the most important partnership in his life, his marriage, is about to go up in smoke.
cast.title: Fireproof

details.biography: Alex Kendrick (born June 11, 1970) is an American filmmaker and actor. He is best known for directing films such as Facing the Giants (2006), Fireproof (2008), Courageous (2011) and War Room (2015).
details.name: Alex Kendrick
